subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Stefan Gimpl of Austria won a Big Air snowboarding World Cup event Saturday in Sofia, Bulgaria. Janne Korpi of Finland, the overall standings leader, was second. The competition was on man-made snow under the lights at a square in Sofia, the capital. “It was a great evening and a great Christmas present for me and my family,” Gimpl said.
